texto: Hello friend, we have reviewed and corrected some errors that were present in the application and new features will be available very soon!
Remember to send your suggestions and comments to our email jammpapps@gmail.com or to my Instagram that can be accessed through the page 'about the app' by clicking on my name!
A new 'Time Zone' box was added in System information.

New features added to App View:

 -Open apps directly
 -Uninstall apps directly

Enjoy these new features and get even more control.
